item.title: JBLU
item.description: score:-6 Chances: The merger of JetBlue Airways and Spirit Airlines is expected to improve competition and reduce prices for consumers.United Airlines is raising baggage fees, indicating potential revenue growth. Risks: The blocked $3.8 billion merger of JetBlue Airways and Spirit Airlines poses a risk to their expansion and market position.
